attributes.action: Create a Great Britain Day or similar national holiday to celebrate Britishness
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many countries have a national holiday to celebrate their nation and heritage, eg, Canada Day, Australia Day.  We should have a national holiday specifically around celebrating Britishness and what a great nation we are.  There should be events to celebrate our past and current achievements and focus positively for a day on all that is good about Great Britain.
